Description:
Perfect Family Home. Just move in.
Upon walking into this immaculately presented home you will be presented with open entry leading to the ground level open Kitchen/ dining / living area, complete with stainless steal appliances , gas cooktop, electric oven, walk in pantry and stone benchtops. Enclosed parents retreat / theatre room for your own quiet time and 4th bedroom / study all on the ground floor. Head upstairs to the 3rd living area and balcony to sit and read the perfect book, as well as the king size master bedroom, large walk in robe and full en-suite, bedrooms 3 & 4 are complete with built in robe and a walk in robe, with central family bathroom. Add to this evaporative cooling and ducted heating, remote double lockup garage, garden shed, and outdoor entertaining area to watch the kids playing on a manicured 634m2 allotment. A must inspection.

Description:
Space, privacy and potential.
Set amongst beautifully maintained and manicured gardens, in a sought-after Leopold location, stands this charming home with so much to offer.
Comprising 3 generous sized bedrooms, an undercover entertaining area, an open plan layout, and a fantastic backyard, this property is ideal for first homeowners, those with young families or even investors.
The kitchen offers plenty of cupboard space and adjoins the dining room, which flows through to the large front living area with an adjoining study room. The dining area looks out to the sunny, undercover entertaining area.
The backyard is expansive and is home to a variety of fruit trees, and greenery, and is perfect for those with young kids and pets and offers space for a potential swimming pool.
Accommodation is made up of a master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite, and two more bedrooms to the rear of the home which both offer built-in robes, and are serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet.
Notable features include:
- Split system A/C.
- Garden shed.
- 4500l water tank.
Located just a 3-minute drive to Gateway Plaza, a short stroll to Leopold Primary School, 10 minutes to the Geelong CBD, and 15 minutes to Ocean Grove's Beaches or the Bellarine Peninsular. This property is certainly worth your inspection.

Description:
Your Search Starts Here
If you are looking to get your foot into the property market, keen on adding to your investment portfolio or aiming to downsize, then this property will tick all the boxes. Situated in the always popular Estuary Estate, in close proximately to beautiful parklands, Leopold Primary School, Gateway Plaza and public transport.
This home is sure to impress. The home itself is positioned on 448m2 (approx.) and comprises of 4 good sized bedrooms, including the master which is positioned to the rear of the home with walk in robe and ensuite. A well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, open plan living and meals area plus a separate formal lounge. Outdoors offers a large alfresco area perfect for those who like to entertain.
Other features including ducted heating, split system cooling unit, double lock up garage with remote control, low maintenance front and back gardens and much more.
An inspection is a must and surely will not disappoint.

Description:
Stunning inside and out!
This gorgeous 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2 living zone home with DLUG has everything you will need and more. An ex-display home by Metricon and based on the Lindeman 28 design it has been fitted with all the high end specs you would expect. In a quiet part of Leopold it will suit the growing family or those looking for a home which has lovely living spaces and a touch of class. The layout has a large entry foyer with stunning porcelain floor tiles and limestone wall tiles. To the right is the master bedroom with walk in robe and deluxe ensuite featuring stone topped twin vanities and oversized shower recess. Moving further into the home is the large open plan kitchen, dining and lounge. This is the hub of the home and really is a stunning space with high ceilings and northerly aspect. High polished floors continue into this area and are complemented by an amazing kitchen with stone benchtops, free standing 900ml oven and gas cooktop and convection oven. Bi-fold timber doors provides access to a substantial grand alfresco and allows for larger gatherings. Beyond this and surrounding the rear and north side of the home is decking and artificial lawn with low maintenance garden. The remaining 3 bedrooms are served by a central bathroom and second living space. Climate control is achieved via split systems, evaporative cooling and central heating. This stunning home is decorated in a neutral pallet and easy living layout. Properties like this are rare to the market and need to be inspected to be appreciated.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
In the Hub of the commercial area, RESIDENCE PLUS COMMERCIAL BUILDING.
Live as well as work next door or rent out, this 2053m2 property has enormous potential for investors, future developers, or owner occupiers. Currently used as a very successful gym and fitness centre, it has multiple exercise areas, ample visitor parking, and its own 4 bedroom residence. Located in the heart of Drysdale's commercial area close to major supermarkets Coles & Aldi, schools, cafes, and Hotel. This site could be utilised for various commercial enterprises or further developed for your own use. Current owners would be interested in a rent-back option. The options are plenty. DRYSDALE is moving and commercial space is hard to get. Do not rent anymore buy your own.

Description:
PERFECT DOWNSIZER OR INVESTMENT PROPERTY
This low maintenance property, conveniently located to the Leopold shopping centre will entice the investor or downsizer wanting enjoyment instead of a busy lifestyle. Three bedroom brick residence, master with walk in robe and the remaining two having B.I.R's. Generous kitchen with combined dining , dishwasher, gas hotplates and electric oven. Lounge provides gas heating and split system cooling. Double garage and side gate access for caravan or trailer. Undercover pergola for entertaining and low maintenance gardens. If you are looking for an investment then these excellent tenants won't disappoint paying $360.00 per week until the 22/8/2020.

Superb Inner Residential Landholding and Properties on 4.85ac (1.96ha) approx.
Its hard to imagine that this most attractive property is positioned within a prime, Drysdale area with all the amenities and services associated with residential living.
Offering an abundance of space, akin to rural lifestyle homes on the periphery, the allotment is zoned GRZ 1 and has multiple subdivisional and development options.
The existing property is comprised of a stunning architectural home with a commanding Corio Bay outlook to the North, as well as a beautifully crafted guest house/studio and Japanese garden surrounds.
Land area: 4.85ac (1.96ha) approx.

Description:
You'll Want it All
Located centrally to Drysdale, build in 2007 and on a 982 M2 allotment is this awesome family home, comprising high ceilings, a formal entrance, off which runs a study to the left and formal lounge to the right. A huge open plan Kitchen/Family/Meals, with spotted gum timber floors, stainless steel appliances and a walk in Butlers Pantry to beat all others.
A separate rumpus room has double doors to the double remote garage, which makes moving in and out as easy as. There are 4 Bedrooms with walk in robes, loads of storage and a second garage/workshop off the laundry. Out side offers loads of benefits too. Some of which are a great outdoor living area with built in wood/pizza oven, plenty of grassed areas and additional off street parking behind gates.
Seeing is believing, so come see for yourself.

Description:
Smart investment in a convenient location!
This impressive 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom unit is 1 of 6 and is set on 289 m² in a popular pocket only a few mins drive from Leopold's Gateway Plaza! Offering low-maintenance and convenient living with a lovely tenant in place hoping to stay long-term, savvy investors will need to act quickly to secure this perfect package!
Comprising of a fantastic open plan kitchen/dining and living area, offering great space and comfort with both tiled and carpeted flooring, high ceilings, LED downlights and Carrier split system heating and cooling for all year-round comfort. The master bedroom is generous in size boasting a walk-in robe and block out blinds. The second bedroom is equipped with both BIR and block out blinds. The central bathroom holds a toilet, bath, large corner shower and IXL heat lamps for those chilly mornings. The roomy functional laundry offers entry to another separate toilet and internal access to the large single lock up garage with electric roller doors.
The kitchen is equipped with stainless steel 4 burner gas cooking, oven, dishwasher, ample cupboard and bench space with a double sink and dining area seating up to 6.
Off the living area are sliding doors opening into a large, low maintenance courtyard boasting tall fences for privacy, ideal for children or your four-legged friend. With Gateway Plaza just a short drive away you'll find an array of shopping and dining options. Close to schools, 24-hour Gym, sporting grounds, public transport and the Portarlington highway allowing easy access to Geelong CBD and the scenic Bellarine Peninsula.
FEATURES
Rent: $330-$340 approx per week
289 m² approx
Split system heating and cooling
Stainless steel kitchen appliances
Single lock up garage
Body corp approx $319 per quarter.
Close proximity to all amenities

Description:
An Irresistible Opportunity For Families & Entertainers!
With nothing left to do except move in and enjoy, heres your chance to embrace the blissful family lifestyle youve been awaiting! Ideally located in a peaceful and well-established pocket of Leopold, this location will leave you wanting for nothing.
A combination of outstanding quality, intelligent design and meticulous attention to detail presents this modern double storey home that sets a new benchmark in ideal living. Nestled on approximately 721m2 there is plenty of space for the kids to enjoy.
The first floor of this stylish property is the hub of the home with its open plan kitchen, living and dining area radiating an abundance of natural light. The kitchen boasts quality and function with every step and will suit the most discerning of chefs. Featuring stone benchtops, gas cooktop, built in oven, dishwasher, and a large butlers pantry offering plenty of storage. The family friendly floor plan of the ground floor also includes an impressive theatre room and spacious office positioned at the front of the home, making you the envy of all your friends.
Upstairs offers a third living space/ rumpus, as well as the central bathroom with separate toilet. The master suite creates a sense of luxury, with direct private balcony access offering magnificent views over Geelong. A large, fully equipped ensuite featuring a double vanity, as well as a generous walk in robe appealing to the fussiest fashionista. The remaining three bedrooms provide ample accommodation, and plenty of robe space.
Built to entertain, the large living and dining areas open to the spacious outdoor entertaining area through large glass sliding doors. Bathed in natural sunlight, this area is perfect for entertaining all year round which flows on to a spacious, yet private yard, making a great space for family and friends to relax and the perfect place for kids to play. Additionally, featuring fantastic side access to the extra shed in the rear yard, perfect for storing those extra toys.
With an abundance of space and storage throughout, this home is perfect for the growing family and those who love to entertain, by infusing the perfect blend of luxury and modern styling. With exquisite attention to detail, no expense has been spared in creating a sense of comfort, whilst ticking all the boxes. Modcons include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double remote garage with internal access, CAT6 cabling, intercom, solar panels, water tanks, under stair storage and landscaped gardens.
Both the Ash Road shops and expansive Gateway Plaza are within close reach. Growing families are taken great care of with Leopold Kindergarten and Leopold Primary School within walking distance from the front door. Public transport is conveniently close by, while easy access to the Leopold Community Hub, Gateway Sanctuary, and local sporting grounds is the icing on top.
Dont miss the opportunity to purchase a home like no other today!

Address: 67 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Prime Time on Bay Shore
Positioned on a generous 586m2 block, fully enclosed by a secure wrap-around fence and double gates this immaculately presented home will exceed all expectations.
Comprising 3 bedrooms all with built - in robes, the master bedrooms includes an ensuite with double shower and ceiling fan. A large light filled first living area including ceiling fan is situated at the fore of the home along with the master bedroom.
This free-flowing floor plan opens into a large open plan kitchen, meals and 2nd living area. The kitchen includes gas cooking, soft closing drawers, Bosch dishwasher and glass splash back with plenty of bench space. The main bathroom including bath and shower and separate toilet service the remaining bedrooms, the generous laundry including storage and access to the garden complete this astute floor plan.
With not a blade of grass out of place the manicured front and back gardens will certainly appeal. An undercover alfresco area with steps up to an elevated garden enjoying subtle views of the Bay. Established fruit trees and lush garden beds including a garden shed.
Features of this well- appointed home include ducted heating, split system cooling, plenty of storage, ceiling fans single - lock up carport and 5KW solar panels. The recent refurb on the property means that you can move straight in and enjoy the Peninsula lifestyle.
Located in a prime Clifton Springs pocket with the Clifton Springs Golf Club across the way, The Dell, bowling club and the Bay at the end of the street. Plenty of bus stops and an easy walk into the Drysdale Township. An ideal first home, downzisers retreat, investment opportunity or a lavish weekender this home caters for all.

Description:
Traditional Bayside Entertainer
The Feel:
Sprawled across a sensational 1469m2 approx. allotment at the end of a quiet court, this traditional 4 bedroom home is fully equipped for your family to embrace a beautiful bayside lifestyle. Boasting low maintenance properties with the extreme comforts of home, perfect orientation infuses the home with natural light, offering seamless connection to the
lush garden and outdoor entertainment spaces to the rear. Truly ready to be enjoyed, there is no time like the present.
The Facts:
- OP living, dining and kitchen with alfresco access
- Privatised second lounge for peace and relaxation
- Bright kitchen with stone tops and european ss apps
- A meals and private dining room gift dual options
- Sensational undercover alfresco area for entertaining
- Above ground swimming pool, perfect for summer fun
- An abundance of free space for children to play
- Beautifully landscaped gardens shroud the home in colour
- Indulgent master suite with WIR and large ensuite
- 3 additional BRs enjoy sunny orientation and natural light
- Well built and presented in immaculate condition
- DLUG with additional SLUG with remote for vehicle overflow
- Plus provision for boat, trailer or caravan parking
- Fantastically located to enjoy the best of the Bellarine
- Close by to bayside beaches and all practical facilities
The Owner Loves....
we love the secluded position, sitting high at the end of the court, the property is peaceful and private, we each have our own preferred nooks to retreat to in the garden. The home is comfortable all year round with abundant natural light and cooling sea breezes. A modern open plan design with good zoning has made this home a much beloved holiday home for our extended family

Description:
Quiet Court Solid Opportunity
Here is a solid and dependable home in a peaceful court location that ticks so many boxes. Neat and tidy, it offers an excellent opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers or investors. The floor plan harnesses the northerly aspect and delivers light filled living that boasts a gas log fire and a sunny garden outlook. There is easy connection to extensive outdoor entertaining from the nearby dining room. The adjacent kitchen is well-planned with a pantry and ample work and storage space. All three bedrooms are generous in size and include built in robes. An updated bathroom and conveniently placed laundry are also included.
Outside the features include a covered and sheltered patio that is perfect for BBQs and large enough to entertain the crowds. A lock up garage with storage and workshop space is a welcome bonus as is the sizeable 690m² (approx) level allotment with a garden that is easily maintained, fully fenced and private.
Understandably Leopold is becoming well known as a handy and popular location. Perfectly placed for easy access to Bellarine beaches, wineries and parklands with Geelong a short commute away. Pindari Court is quiet and family friendly and is within walking distance to parks and the local primary school. Gateway Plaza, with all the essential amenities, is just 5 minutes away. This value filled opportunity will appeal to anyone who appreciates location and liveability.

Description:
Potential-Packed Property Upon Approx. 723m2!
Occupying approx. 723m2, this potential-packed property presents a fantastic opportunity for first homebuyers, investors, renovators, and developers alike (STCA)!
When it comes to convenient living, this location packs a punch. The Dorothy Street shops are just footsteps away, meaning you dont have to venture far to pick up some groceries or grab some last-minute takeaway. Young families will appreciate that both Allanvale Preschool and Leopold Primary School are within easy walking distance. The Leopold Community Hub and Leopold Library are wonderfully close by, while the popular Gateway Plaza will leave you spoilt for choice with shopping and dining options. Easy access to public transport, local sporting grounds, and the Gateway Sanctuary is the icing on the cake.
The front lounge welcomes in an abundance of natural light and creates ample space for when family and friends to come to visit. The original dining/kitchen zone is equipped with an oven and electric cooktop. Two bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the bathroom, which features a shower, bathtub, and single vanity. The laundry and separate toilet complete the layout, while a split-system air conditioner keeps you comfortable in all seasons.
Both the front and backyard are wonderfully spacious - providing renovators with infinite possibilities for a home extension or superb outdoor entertaining zone (STCA)!
The double lock-up garage offers secure parking, while the long driveway provides backyard vehicle access perfect for those needing to store caravans, boats, or trailers.
So whether youre dreaming of breaking into the property market, searching for a terrific investment or makeover project, or are planning to wipe the slate clean for development (STCA), this property will be at the top of your list! Inspect without delay!

Description:
Quality Like No Other
With few words to describe the calibre of this stunning family home, it is bound to blow you away from the moment you step through the front door. This quality-built home offers the ultimate luxury family lifestyle, with the utmost of quality fixtures and fittings throughout and exquisite attention to detail shown. No expense has been spared in creating this sense of comfort, whilst ticking all of your boxes.
Located on the pinnacle of the Estuary Estate offering unobscured views over the city of Greater Geelong. This is where you'll find 105 Hillclimb Dve Leopold.A combination of outstanding quality, intelligent design and meticulous attention to detail presents this modern double storey home that sets a new benchmark in ideal living.
The first floor of this stylish property is the hub of the home with its open plan kitchen, living and dining area radiating an abundance of natural light. The kitchen will be the envy of any deserving chef. Offering stone benchtops, walk in butlers pantry, quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, feature lighting and an abundance of storage. The lounge and dining both pose custom cabinetry highlighting the attention to detail. The family friendly floor plan of the ground floor also includes a second separate lounge, a spacious bedroom acting as a guest suite with walk in robe and ensuite, a separate powder room and spacious a home office/ fifth bedroom positioned at the front of the home.
Upstairs offers a third living space/ rumpus, a perfect place for the kids to enjoy, as well as the central bathroom with separate toilet. The master suite creates a sense of luxury, with direct private balcony access offering magnificent views over Geelong. Showcasing a beautiful feature wall with a hidden door that leads through to a large, fully equipped ensuite featuring a double vanity, as well as a generous walk through robe appealing to the fussiest fashionista. The remaining three bedrooms provide ample accommodation, with all consisting of large robe space.
Built to entertain, the large living and dining areas open to the spacious outdoor entertaining area through large glass sliding doors. Bathed in natural sunlight, this area is perfect for entertaining all year round which flows on to a spacious, yet private yard, making a great space for family and friends to relax and the perfect place for kids to play.
With an abundance of space and storage throughout, this home is perfect for the growing family and those who love to entertain, by infusing the perfect blend of luxury and modern styling. With exquisite attention to detail, no expense has been spared in creating a sense of comfort, whilst ticking all the boxes. Modcons include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system, double remote garage with internal access and landscaped gardens.
Public transport is conveniently close by, while easy access to the Gateway Plaza, Leopold Primary School, Gateway Sanctuary, and local sporting grounds is the icing on top.
The list of features on this property are simply too numerous to mention
So why not came and inspect it for yourself?

Description:
A Magnificent Home with An Amazing View!
Hurry to inspect this magnificent property in the ever-popular town of Leopold. This is an ideal entry into the real estate game, family first-home or investment - jump on it quick!
The fantastic floor plan comprises of four great size bedrooms, two with built-in robes and master with an en suite and walk-in dressing room.
There are modern touches and a neutral palette throughout. A galley-style kitchen is centrally located and showcases an island stone bench, stainless steel appliances, dual sink, built-in pantry, five-burner stove top and ample storage.
Flowing onto an open-plan dining and living area that spills out to an undercover, entertaining zone. The established lawn provides space for big and little kids to play with added privacy and shade.
Other features include a double lock-up remote garage, workshop, sloping rock garden, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, air-conditioner, ceiling fans, main bathroom with a soaker tub, secure yard, side gate and solar-heated hot water system.
With the road 10 minutes to Geelong, 50 minutes to Melbourne and the rest of Bellarine nearby you will be spoilt for choice. 5 minutes to Gateway Plaza shopping centre, local schools, kindergartens and sporting facilities are all within distance so you can throw away your car keys. This is convenient living - call or email Lee Botsios on 0436 533 066 to inspect today!
- Four spacious bedrooms
- Double remote lock-up garage, workshop and garden shed
- Secure private yard with large lawn space
- Outdoor, undercover barbeque area
- Timber floorboards throughout the open-plan living
- Well-maintained property with everything done

Description:
Perfect Private Oasis!
Behind its pristine façade and captivating landscaped gardens, 14 Narawi Avenue is truly an impressive family home which has that "wow factor" written all over it. Superbly situated in one of Clifton Springs most coveted pockets, the home is set on a 626sqm(approx.) allotment and offers the astute buyer the ability to utilise the properties full potential to be able to have off street parking for a boat or a caravan with ease. Upon entering the home you are greeted with a welcoming hallway featuring beautiful timber floors which enhances the significant open plan design allowing the home to flow seamlessly from room to room. Boasting two separate living areas and a study the options for relaxing are endless. Featuring 3 bedrooms, with the master bedroom having the luxury of a walk in robe and ensuite, the home offers flexible accommodation options. Showcasing the inside of the home is the sophisticated kitchen which oozes instant appeal while being practical and functional at the same time. Outside presents the same high level of quality offering plenty of space for relaxing and entertaining in style, highlighted by landscaped gardens providing supreme privacy. Comprehensively appointed throughout this fine family home includes an abundance of storage, separate laundry with side access, a garden shed, a split system air conditioner for cooling and gas ducted heating. This superbly presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for. Only a short stroll to public transport, an excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private & access to the Bellarine Peninsulas world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhances the lifestyle appeal of this prestigious location. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.

Address: 66 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
GREAT PROPERTY! GREAT PRICE!
Located in sought after Clifton Springs just a leisurely stroll to the waters edge, with the local milk bar round the corner and public transport close by. This property is central to all attractions and amenities the Bellarine has to offer.
On entry the home is open and spacious. This is a home with individual style - spacious rooms, over height doors and soaring ceilings in the living room and master bedroom. Massive floor to ceiling windows maximise light and aspect. Freshly painted walls throughout and with the kitchen already modernised it will be a matter of adding individual touches to your new home.
Views of Corio Bay and surrounds can be captured from the kitchen, living and master bedroom.
The master suite is spacious as are two minor bedrooms with ample storage in each.
Reverse cycle cooling and central gas heating are supplemented by a character gas log fire in the lounge area.
The double garage has internal access to the home and a storeroom to the rear.
Inspection is a must to appreciate this very individual character home.
There is the opportunity to also purchase the adjacent, vacant block of land with established garage. (615m2)

Description:
UNITS WALKING DISTANCE TO AMENITIES IN DEMAND
This just listed two bedroom unit is a short walk to the township of Drysdale. Rarely do units come on the market so close to town.
Freshly painted in neutral tones, good functional layout. Everything in easy reach in the kitchen. Neat undercover area at the rear of the unit to sit and read the paper and listen to the birds. Electric heating for the cooler months and a split system to keep you cool in summer. Single garage with remote plus a visitor parking spot. Built with maintenance free cladding and protected by a veranda allows you more time to enjoy the property. There are only three units on the site.
Why Drysdale? Itâs a historic town that lacks nothing that you require for a quiet life. Everything is close and handy including public transport, medical centres, shopping complexes etc. Will suit downsizer or investor.
Come along to an open for inspection or book a private viewing. You wonât be disappointed.
